level.text: Application for the issuance of a special license to sell or offer for sale fruit, food, lunches, candy, tobacco, drinks, or similar items in any reviewing stand or in the Inaugural Area shall be submitted to the Director of the Department of Consumer and Regulatory Affairs on a form provided by the Director for this purpose.
The application shall be accompanied by three (3) full-face photographs measuring two inches by two inches (2 in. x 2 in.), and taken after the date of the publication of these regulations.
Each application shall be subject to the approval of the Concessions Committee.

After approving an application for a special license, the Concessions Committee shall forward the application, together with the photographs that accompanied it, to the Director of the Department of Consumer and Regulatory Affairs.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Section 19(c) of the Presidential Inauguration Special Regulations and Rule of Interpretation Concerning Nonrevival of Statutes Act of 1982, D.C. Law 4-125, 29 DCR 2093 (May 21, 1982).
